title: Can't set club tag (even with 5 members)
body: Hey guys, i recently remade my club to change the club tag. After making the club and inviting my friends, the set club button seems to have disappeared, any thoughts on how to get my tag? i also provided a screenshot of my client thx.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Club tag creation was recently disabled.

You can read more about why in [this thread](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/ih5gWw8j-56-club-tag-creation-disabled-and-server-error-message-in-client).
hey guns4pies in order to get a tag for u and ur club members u need to be a LoL prodigy like me
